name: McCann Manchester
tagline: There Is No Greater Currency Than the Truth
description: We are one of the UKs largest marketing communications agencies outside London, employing over 250 people who work together to create, develop and implement brand advertising and communication strategies. As an integrated agency, we've got opportunities in a number of different areas including Account Management, Creative Strategy and Insight, Data Planning, Digital Design and Development, Media Planning and Buying and PR and Social Media.
